title: Livelock Poll
body:
I have Livelock repack ready for many days now. The only problem is, that CODEX released contains only English voiceovers, and while I’ve got Russian too, French and German ones are still missing and I can’t tell if I will be able to get them at all. So here’s the poll.

[democracy id=”4″]

PS: Don’t afraid, it doesn’t interfere with Fallout 4 repack timing 🙂
